description: There are many ways to prepare a potato salad, and this tasty version is a Midwestern classic.
keywords: Potato salad,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Dairy free,Potato,Peanut free
name: Tasty Potato Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 bunch spring onions, white and palegreen parts only, finely chopped
1 tbs capers, drained or rinsed, and finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the potatoes whole in a large pan of boiling salted water for 20-25 minutes until tender. Drain and set aside to cool. When cold, peel and cut the potatoes carefully into 3cm cubes.
In a bowl, mix together the mayonnaise, mustard, celery, spring onions, capers, and lemon juice, and season well.
Place the potatoes into a large serving bowl and gently toss the mayonnaise mixture through the potatoes, being careful not to break them up.
